ï»¿I think the best advice is often the most painful advice.
Very early in my career I had a very tough boss, but she had my best intentions at heart.
And once she pulled me aside and she said,...
... "You know what, sometimes I feel like you just can't finish this."
There's a Yiddish expression, "Everything in life is bashert," which means "It's meant to be."
Even if something is negative, you can learn from it and course correct.
I told her that I didn't have a lot of experience leading recruiting organizations,...
...most men would not let that get in their way of taking a new opportunity.
